page.title: 01 INTRODUCTION
page.content:
{ Our Domesday block is situated in {lush and rich farmland to the north of {the fertile Vale of York. To the {north-west of the twelve square {kilometre block we have the twin {village of Brafferton and Helperby; {only the most established residents {seem familiar with the exact border {between the two! Brafferton has little {of importance to note whilst Helperby {falls largely in a neighbouring {survey; however we do have 'Back Lane' {which runs parallel to the main street {in Helperby. There is no other {settlement. }
8 FARMS 3 MINOR ROADS:Helperby to Raskelf Raskelf to Tholthorpe Helperby to Myton and Tollerton.
